context: Code review of existing codebase - tests whether the agent applies SOLID principles, detects anti-patterns, and documents findings properly

checklist.name: Classifies decision type
checklist.description: Classifies the analysis as architectural, tactical, or foundational before proceeding

checklist.name: Checks SRP compliance
checklist.description: Evaluates whether classes have single responsibility and identifies violations

checklist.name: Checks OCP compliance
checklist.description: Evaluates whether code is open for extension, closed for modification

checklist.name: Checks LSP compliance
checklist.description: Evaluates whether subtypes preserve base behavior contracts

checklist.name: Checks ISP compliance
checklist.description: Evaluates whether clients depend only on methods they use

checklist.name: Checks DIP compliance
checklist.description: Evaluates whether code depends on abstractions, not concrete details

checklist.name: Detects god class anti-pattern
checklist.description: Identifies god classes/services that handle multiple concerns

checklist.name: Detects hardcoded secrets
checklist.description: Identifies hardcoded environment configuration or secrets

checklist.name: Detects bypassed interfaces
checklist.description: Identifies direct concrete coupling instead of interface/port patterns

checklist.name: Documents with BAD/GOOD format
checklist.description: Uses BAD/GOOD corrective action format for anti-pattern violations

checklist.name: Documents tradeoffs
checklist.description: Documents alternatives considered, decision rationale, and risks

checklist.name: Checks TypeScript strictness
checklist.description: Identifies use of 'any', '@ts-ignore' in critical paths
